description:
Bless is a high quality, full featured hex editor.  It is written in mono/Gtk# and its primary platform is GNU/Linux. However it should be able to run without problems on every platform that mono and Gtk# run.

#### Features
* Efficient editing of large data files and block devices
* Multilevel undo - redo operations
* Customizable data views
* Fast data rendering on screen
* Multiple tabs
* Fast find and replace operations
* A data conversion table
* Advanced copy/paste capabilities
* Highlighting of selection pattern matches in the file
* Plugin based architecture
* Export of data to text and html (others with plugins)
* Bitwise operations on data
* A comprehensive user manual

#### Documentation
* [Screenshots](http://home.gna.org/bless/screenshots.html)
* [FAQ](http://home.gna.org/bless/bless-manual/ch06.html)
* [Manual](http://home.gna.org/bless/bless-manual/index.html)

#### Community
* [Mailing list](http://gna.org/mail/?group=bless)
author: Alexandros Frantzis
